duties_responsibilities.duty: Communicate with beneficiaries and annuitants to bring claims into good order through verbal and written communication.
Process claims, determine good order of requirements, and calculate benefits according to contractual provisions.
Participate in projects as needed to improve claims processing and customer experience.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and available for overtime on short notice.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Finance, or related field.
